TextLibrary.Text: Red-Axe
One of the Lesser Races? In the house of Red-Axe? This is an outrage! Prepare yourself for battle!
One of the Lesser Races? In the house of Red-Axe? This is an outrage! Prepare yourself for battle!
One of the Lesser Races? In the house of Red-Axe? This is an outrage! Prepare yourself for battle!
One of the Lesser Races? In the house of Red-Axe? This is an outrage! Prepare yourself for battle!
Wait! Tauron Flamebite sent me! I am a Firewalker! I have come to be trained in the axe.
Wait! Tauron Flamebite sent me! I am a Firewalker! I have come to be trained in the axe.
Wait! Tauron Flamebite sent me! I am a Firewalker! I have come to be trained in the axe.
Wait! Tauron Flamebite sent me! I am a Firewalker! I have come to be trained in the axe.
A Firewalker? Ahaha! You are no Firewalker - your skin is too pink.
A Firewalker? Ahaha! You are no Firewalker - your skin is too pink.

I have passed the Trial of Fire. I have climbed the Volcano and defeated a Fire Elemental.
I have passed the Trial of Fire. I have climbed the Volcano and defeated a Fire Elemental.
I have passed the Trial of Fire. I have climbed the Volcano and defeated a Fire Elemental.
I have passed the Trial of Fire. I have climbed the Volcano and defeated a Fire Elemental.
Then prove it to me. I shall summon another one. Defeat it and I will train you.
Then prove it to me. I shall summon another one. Defeat it and I will train you.
Then prove it to me. I shall summon another one. Defeat it and I will train you.
Then prove it to me. I shall summon another one. Defeat it and I will train you.
You can summon a Fire Elemental?
You can summon a Fire Elemental?
You can summon a Fire Elemental?
You can summon a Fire Elemental?
My axe was a gift from Tauron's father. It has many powers. Summoning Fire Elementals is only one of them. Now prepare for battle...
